meanings.definition: Extending or involving the whole of a nation or country.
meanings.sent1: The countrywide celebration brought people together from all over the nation.
meanings.sent2: The countrywide policy aimed to benefit citizens across the entire country.
meanings.sent3: The countrywide search for the missing cat involved every corner of the nation.
meanings.sent4: The countrywide impact of the new law was felt by everyone in the country.
meanings.sent5: The countrywide storm caused widespread damage throughout the nation.

meanings.sent1: The news spread countrywide within hours of the event.
meanings.sent2: The virus quickly spread countrywide, affecting people in every region.
meanings.sent3: The marathon runner traveled countrywide to participate in races across the nation.
meanings.sent4: The music festival attracted fans countrywide, drawing attendees from all over the country.
meanings.sent5: The new product launch was advertised countrywide, reaching customers nationwide.
